summary:
Email, or electronic mail, is a way to send and receive messages using computers or other devices. It's like regular mail but digital. You can get new emails, read, delete, save, or reply to them. When someone changes an image on Wikipedia, the uploader gets an email alert.

Emails travel through computer networks, mainly the internet. They are stored and forwarded by email servers, so you can access them anytime. Emails started as simple text but now can include pictures and other media. It's a super common way to communicate, especially for work, school, and more.
title: Email
